id: scenario-value-scanner-grandparent-scenarios-community-teaching and sharing skills in community education
title: Teaching and sharing skills in community education
description: Teaching and sharing skills in community education
content:
Scenario: Teaching and sharing skills in community education
    Given Margaret has skills in health, crafts, traditional knowledge
    And community members want to learn these skills
    When Margaret teaches classes or workshops
    Then the community_elohim should recognize teaching as care work
    And it should facilitate skill-sharing opportunities
    And it should connect Margaret with learners
    And community education should be valued and supported
    And Margaret's teaching should accumulate care tokens
    And community should benefit from skill transmission
